pages.title: Controller
pages.text: The Controller is your main interface to the Turbine.$(br2)Right click on the Controller to open it's graphical user interface and from there you can turn the Turbine on or off, check how much vapor and coolant are present in the internal tanks, how fast the $(l:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l) is spinning and how much energy is being generated.

You can also regulate how much vapor is flowing around the $(l:turbine/rotor)Rotor$(/l), what to do with the vapor once it's condensed back to the original coolant and engage or disengage the $(l:turbine/coils)Induction Coils$(/l).
$(l)Mandatory:$() at least one is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() yes
